title: Deciphering the dynamic interfacial chemistry of calcium metal anodes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01257G, Paper
Huijun Lin, Jiayi Meng, Weihua Guo, Renjie Li, Yuyang Yi, Yiyuan Ma, Chi Fai Cheung, Doron Aurbach, Zheng-Long Xu
We unveil the formation and evolution of passivation layers on the surface of Ca metal anodes in a representative borate-based electrolyte. They show a beneficial role in activating the Ca metal and concurrently hindering its electrolyte corrosion.
